decision_conditions: The proposed works would have a significantly negative impact upon the tree's long-term health, and the tree's amenity value. In the absence of sufficient supporting evidence to demonstrate the necessity of the proposals, the stated reasons for the work are considered unjustified.

The application form has "No" selected, when asked if the reasons for carrying out the proposed works are due to the condition of the tree, yet the reason given is related to the condition of the tree. The application therefore is not consistent, and the requirement to provide a professional arboricultural condition report is omitted.
description: Works to Ash tree covered by LBE ORDER NO 101 (1980): Crown reduction by 3-4m.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
